website_summaries.verdict: By far one of the best shorty wetsuits on the market, this product will keep you comfortable and warm with its premium construction.
pros: High collar for extra protection, but fully adjustable
Suit comes with a hidden key pocket
Customers rave over the product's excellent sizing and fit
cons: Colored areas will crack over time, but this can be avoided by purchasing the all-black option

customer_reviews.title: will look good for a longer period of time
customer_reviews.text: BUY THE SOLID BLACK if you want it to look nicer longer! I coach swimming with a USA Swim Club and I am in the water for several hours most days Monday-Friday. The water temperature I coach and teach in is on the "Cold Side" for competitive swimming reasons. The pool is also well chlorinated I just purchased my 5th suit in a size 12. The suit lasts me for at least 6 months. The solid black suit, rather than the pink and blue sleeved suits, will look good for a longer period of time. The colored area on the sleeves will wrinkle and crack.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen M.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Guide spot on - watch the arms though
customer_reviews.text: Size 4 = Perfect fit for daughter that is 5' 2" and 105 lbs. Only challenge is that the arms seem tight for her - she plays lacrosse and has biceps that boys her age would kill for. Not sure the options when you have larger than 'standard' arms and a neoprene suit. She will be wearing it surfing this week in the Atlantic so will advise any additional info (good or bad) thereafter. Sizing charts are spot on and she really liked the color scheme and the 'womens' cut as she tried on her brothers suit and it definitely did not fit her hips / waist properly. Stitching and quality solid. YKK zippers are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a vacation and used the provided size chart to select my size. I'm about 5'2" and weight 118 lbs. I purchased a size 6 and it was too short through the torso. I know they are supposed to fit snuggly so that water can get trapped between the suit and skin but this was pulling on my shoulders and through the groin. I didn't have time to repurchase before we left on vacation so I returned it. The quality seemed very good, however, when purchasing and selecting a size, you may want to order up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: I followed the sizing charts and the size/fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this suit for my first sprint triathlon. I've never used a wetsuit before, trained mainly in pools, and was thrilled about the flotation and confidence it gave me. I was nervous about the triathlon but after I put the wetsuit on and warmed up swimming a few minutes I was stoked to compete. I followed the sizing charts and the size/fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is NOT accurate
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Women's Size 8 wetsuit. Would not fit my wife, who is 5'4" and 125lbs. Using the sizing guide the seller provides, the size 8 should have fit. My daughter tried on the suit and found it to be tight as well. She's 5'2" and 113 lbs. She typically gets by with a size 4. The sizing on these suits are wildly off. My guess depends on what day they are made or which outsourcer they are using to make them. Very disappointed as I'm a loyal O'Neill customer.
customer_reviews.author: CONSUMER

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on 3rd day of diving.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke on the 3rd day of diving. ONeill must have gone cheap on this shorty wetsuit. We were on the boat getting suited up, and went to pull up the zipper for my wife and it ripped off one of the sides. Unbelievable. Thanks for a cold dive, since I gave her my wetsuit. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ed (The Bull) Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and checking the O'Neill website I ordered a size 14 and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'5'' 160lbs so I wondered if it would be too long, but it isn't and it fits greats. There's good motion in the upper arms and shoulder area as well. Nothing is too constricting, but it is like a second skin. As it should be. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried several sizes but the arms were too small for me. Granted, I do have large arms... but I'm not The Hulk. It was too uncomfy so I had to return. This review us for fit only, not performance. My husband has the men's model and loves his.
customer_reviews.author: Hippy Woman

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband purchased this for me for our Mexico trip. I am highly sensitive to cold and we have about 4 days of cenote and underground river activities planned... all I can say is that this wonderful wetsuit saved me form getting hypothermia in those freezing cold waters. I was able to enjoy every minute of our trip! I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this, not too bulky. I have yet to test this in water but I am 5' 11" and I orderes 14 based on the chart (actual measurements not pure weight or US size). I have a long torso so size 12 would fit but would be short. I like the color and the fit. Light, easy to put on I will update after I test it in water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" 150lb; solid size 6 in regular clothes. I ordered the size 10 and though it fit, it was a little too snug under and on my arms so I'm returning it. I don't think my arms are bigger than average for my size - my legs are thicker than average but they seem to fit fine. Material and product quality felt great...and loved the color. Sad I need to return it. I'm sure the next size up would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Funny Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift ~ she wears a USA women's size 12. The hang tag on the garment said size 12 but the tag sewn to the inside the wetsuit said USA size 10. In spite of the odds it fit just fine. O'Neill makes really good quality surf gear which should provide comfort in the water for many years to come. I'd recommend O'Neill products to anyone that's into water sports.
customer_reviews.author: JonesyJones

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the O'Neill website to get the correct sizing. Also, I did quite a bit of research and make sure you understand how a wetsuit is supposed to fit. It will be TIGHT though you should be able to breathe without trouble. For what it's worth, I am a 4 in street clothes and the size 4 wetsuit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for swimming with dolphins in Mexico, and snorkeling in Grand Cayman on our cruise! Hate cold water, but this suit made it easy to get in without any hesitation, and an added bonus is it covers and smooths unsightly middle- aged flab! Order according to measurements on chart.
customer_reviews.author: ACO3

customer_reviews.title: but has a funny smell that permeated my other clothing when I kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job in keeping me warm in cold water during open water swims, but has a funny smell that permeated my other clothing when I kept it hanging in my closet. I hadn't even used it yet, so the odor wasn't from use. It just doesn't smell very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Small but high quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great suit, but wow is the sizing small! I usually wear a women's size 8-10, and I ordered a 12 and can barely wiggle into it. Should work fine once in the water though!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Great looking wet suit for scuba diving in warm weather
customer_reviews.text: I love this wet suit. Its easy to get into and is very comfortable. I have used it several times, great for the summertime weather. When its too hot for a full suit but you are still looking for protection, this is a very handy item. I typically wear a size 6 in clothes and ordered a size 6 when purchasing this wet suit. It was a perfect fit. The key pocket also comes in very handy, it is located in the back area and folds over completely protecting the key from falling out. Zip up your suit and know that your key is in a safe place. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Ignored the height measurements and went by the weight and body measurements - ended up with a size 12 and I'm happy with the wa
customer_reviews.text: Used the sizing chart at O'Neill to pick the right size (since there seemed to be such a sizing issue). Ignored the height measurements and went by the weight and body measurements - ended up with a size 12 and I'm happy with the way it fits. Squashes the girls quite a bit, but that's ok, I'm looking forward to using it when I take a whitewater class this spring or summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described by previous reviewers and is comfortable, at least when dr
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten to use this is the ocean, yet!! Fits as described by previous reviewers and is comfortable, at least when dr.: I have thin arms and it fits me fine, but if you have bulky arms the sleeves are gonna be tight!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanthe

customer_reviews.title: Super nice suit!
customer_reviews.text: Much more attractive in real life and appears to be well made. At 5'8" I normally wear 14-16. For me, the arm and chest is too restrictive and somewhat short wasted. Love the suit and wished they made a large size.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: No free returns if it doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Check the sizing chart. There is no free returns on these. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this well made women's shorty wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wet suit for our snorkeling trip to Mexico. Even though the waters are warm I still get cold when I am out in the water too long. I used this suit on my water adventures & it worked great! I ordered one size bigger than I would nomally take ( size 12 ) & it fit perfect! Very comfortable....well made & kept me really warm.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Quality shorty!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect. Came on time and as expected. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: I thought that it took to long to scan I was had my finger on that scanner for  about 10 minutes I  removed this app from my kindle do not get !!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great female friendly wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit! I used it for a a triathalon with 1/3 mile swim, no chafing or tugging. I did have to go one size up and return the first suit; although I ordered according to weight/height chart provided by O'Neill.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Mullery

customer_reviews.title: Tight and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This one was Super tight and uncomfortable. I ended up w the Henderson front zip shorty ordered from Amazon. I took it to Galapagos and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Mariscal

customer_reviews.title: Fit pretty good but loosened up when it got wet
customer_reviews.text: Fit pretty good but loosened up when it got wet. I use it to swim in my pool when the pool temperature is still 68-70. The quality is excellent, fast shipping, and priced good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: great. wet  suit
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Just what I wanted. The fit is just right, I am swimming. At a lake. In Canada. Temp I'd 70 degrees. And this suit is just what I needed. I AM. AblE to. Swim . FOR. AN HOUR AND. not. Get cold at all .It is. Light weight. And comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: norah elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wet suit. I bought it for lap swimming in my pool in the winter. It kept me in the pool until the water got into the 50s. After that I needed a hood and a full length suit!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great seller. Fast ship
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. Fast ship. Reviews on this item are accurate. One addition - A bit tight at the neckline. If you do not like things tight around your neck, you may want to try a size bigger or try a different brand. It did not bother my daughter, but it does kind of irritate me at least if I am not in the water. I have not tried it in the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: ksd

customer_reviews.title: Biceps beware
customer_reviews.text: I'm a waterskiing fanatic and needed a short suit for skiing in May while the water is still freezing, kept me warm enough but the arms aren't made for waterski muscles, or any muscles really. That was the only tight part of the suit, everything else fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I used in 65 degree water and it was too thin, however. I will get a thicker suit for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roche

customer_reviews.title: Sizing of suit
customer_reviews.text: Order one size larger than you would normally wear. Luckily, I read that review before I ordered mine. Arms are extremely too small and I don't have large upper arms. Don't know if they will get more loose - I sure hope so!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish, don’t need help getting it zipped!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable, fit as expected. Super great suit and easy to get into without help!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E Hern

customer_reviews.title: Great product , wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Very cute...I ordered women's size and got a youth size . The product itself is great, my step-daughter loves it and it fits her perfectly. I ordered another in adult size so I'll cross my fingers and hope it fits .
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wetsuit. Took it diving to 60ft in Belize... the water wasn't cold but this wetsuit kept my core temperature nice and even and gave me some security while I wove around coral and lots of wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: GeoLady

customer_reviews.title: good quality and decent fit it feels way too tight ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality and decent fit it feels way too tight until you get in the water and then it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Got to me in Great time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my swim lessons! Accurate fit and food quality
customer_reviews.author: Annie Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.  Runs a size small.  Keeps warmth in!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely.I typically wear size 6-8 (5'0" 123 lb) Keeps me warm in unheated swimming pool!
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a wetsuit, or even worn one, but I do enjoy this one. I'm 5'9", 140lbs and purchased a 12 and it fit perfectly. I used it paddle boarding, and it kept me warm and covered, with no sun burn. Fantastic quality for the price. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wetsuit at a good price but it runs small. I own two other O'Neill wetsuits -- same size-- but I had to send this one back because it did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!  So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size up based on everyone's review and it fits prefect! Keeps me warm but not made for diving in cold water. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gina and Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: The quality and the feeling is awesome. I have to return mine - it runs ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality and the feeling is awesome. I have to return mine - it runs really small. I am 126 lb, 5-09 height and L is too small for me. It is too late now but I will keep it in mind and when need it again will order XL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love quality but size is small
customer_reviews.text: Love quality but size is small.. I am an 8 in clothing ....I ordered a 10 and 12...the 12 fit best so 10 went back. It's perfect for gulf fall and spring water temps...and activity
customer_reviews.author: phyllis ann davis

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it and fit was great. Kept her warm on a caribbean and gulf of mexico snorkeling trip in which the gulf was quite cool for her.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I just started scuba and wanted something for warm water, this fit great, felt good on and looked good too! I bought a size 10, which is close to what I normally wear. I'm 5'7" and weigh 140.
customer_reviews.author: RRL

customer_reviews.title: Tight but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wooobuddy you better be prepare for a tight struggle, but a very good suit
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Keeps me warm. That is all. Have a nice day.
customer_reviews.author: MDarb

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for long torsos
customer_reviews.text: I have a long torso and this is way too short in the body for me. I am only 5'10 but my torso is longer than usual. For people with short bodies, this would probably work great for them.
customer_reviews.author: myob

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Suit
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail today and I will be returning it, but not because of defects; in fact, just the opposite. This suit is way too nice for what I need it for; I was planning on ordering a swimsuit that was more modest for my weekly swim class, and this suit would be way too heavy or bulky for me to keep up in the class, I'm afraid. The material is super nice and durable looking, great for scuba or snorkeling, which is what it's intended for, I'm sure. The suit looks fabulous on, as well, but I think I would just look ridiculous wearing this to class. No fault on the manufacturer, at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Keeps the cold water out and my body warm. Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood1985

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably amazing
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is phenomenal. I use it to swim laps in my backyard lap pool. Yesterday water was 71, and I was quite comfortable. The range of motion is not impeded. Try the butterfly. Buy your true size. It will most likely fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: OH YES
customer_reviews.text: I'M A SIZE 12/12 BUT ORDERED THE 14 AND IT FITS JUST BEAUTIFULLY.....IT KEPT ME COMFORTABLE IN THE PUEBLO COLORADO RESERVOIR OVER THE SUMMER. WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: LuvCO

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for snorkeling in the caribbean (I know, I'm a wimp), and it was exactly what I was hoping for! The size chart was right on - the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Margie E

customer_reviews.title: fit well and was well received by my daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: fit well and was well received by my daughter. Now I just have to order the same one with long sleeves and full leg coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves it and uses it regulary at the lake or ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL. GOOD MATERIAL. WILL BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I'M PETITE. 5 FOOT 1INCHES ASIAN. IT WAS A GOOD FIT FOR ME, BUT MOST LIKELY TOO SMALL FOR OTHERS. SIZES RUN SMALL. CAN STAY IN COOLER WATER LONGER. GOOD INSULATION.
customer_reviews.author: JC Watertown, NY

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a recent snorkeling trip to the BVI. It didn't fit me well and I ended up purchasing a different style O'Neill suit for my trip. It seemed well made, it was just a comfort issue.
customer_reviews.author: kcrawford

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 'my size' (14) and it truly fit. It was a standard wetsuit and kept me fairly warm. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Enginerd

customer_reviews.title: My bad. Great suit though
customer_reviews.text: Product is very true to size. I ordered a larger size because so many women's items run small but this is accurate. It is too big for me only cause I ordered up a size or two. My bad. Great suit though. Wore it anyway and kept me really warm and is easy to zip up etc.... Nice style!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cooler waters. Wore it for surfing in Feb in Sayulita, and was comfortable despite the chilly water.
customer_reviews.author: kdangeruss

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Rubber interior edging on sleeves and legs takes some getting used to when putting on or taking off. But still comfortable and a great fit like all O'Neill suits. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: kiml

customer_reviews.title: perfect wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for comfortable snorkeling in the Pacific. Got here fast and great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Alby

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! I used this wet suit to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! I used this wet suit to go surfing in San Diego, CA in late August, 2015. It was the perfect weather for a short sleeve and short pant suit!
customer_reviews.author: Tana M Lieb

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, overall a solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my scuba diving certification class in the pool, and it did the trick. I'm normally a size 8, but had to get a 14 in this bad boy thanks to how awkward wetsuits always are. I probably would have been fine going with a 12 because it's not as tight as it could be, but I don't plan on exchanging it. I'll be using it for a family diving trip in Bonaire, and will probably use it in the future for warm water triathlons when I don't want the full wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: swimbikepsych

customer_reviews.title: This suit fits great (although Im usually a size 10
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits great (although Im usually a size 10, I ordered a 14). Feels like it will be great in Cali this summer. Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: sgjen

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit, although i would recomend a size up ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit, although i would recomend a size up than what one would usually wear just because the arms are almost too tight
customer_reviews.author: solalovesit

customer_reviews.title: True to size. I am petite and curvy and ...
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I am petite and curvy and the size of my regular clothing accurately matched the size I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Cpinny14

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this purchase. I would recommend it for all water sport activities, skiing, jet skiing, snorkeling and diving.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior_joe

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Ordered size 14 and I'm 5'8" and 165. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: IrishGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Definitely worth spending a little more for better quality. I'm sold on O'Neill.
customer_reviews.author: MDK

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Fits well....got a size too big so I don't have to struggle to get into it but it's not bulky feeling.
customer_reviews.author: WendieAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit for the price. I ordered two sizes larger than I am and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, works well
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I hoped for. Fits well and keeps me warm.....quality is terrific. I've now purchased an O'Neill full 3/4mm wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  I wore it for my dive test.
customer_reviews.text: I had to go up two sizes according to the chart, and the suit fit perfectly. The water was in the mid 70s and my core was toasty. It slipped on and off with ease...
customer_reviews.author: NatureGirl

customer_reviews.title: ... perfectly and moves freely - not stiff and uncomfortable like some wetsuits can be
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and moves freely - not stiff and uncomfortable like some wetsuits can be. Love O'Neill products!
customer_reviews.author: Bree Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great! Am so happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Great! Am so happy with this...I go swimming outside in a NY pool...& I'm still swimming thanks to this :)!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jeret

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly! I used the sizing guide on ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly! I used the sizing guide on their web site. The thickness of the insulation was just right for my snorkeling vacation in Puerto Vallarta in March!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Tupper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of use out of these at the ocean and lake. Fits well and is of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Hoose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, expect to get water in
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, expect to get water in, but the normal amount. I can stay in the water as long as 4+ hour (I am a swimming teacher)
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: My first aqua bike
customer_reviews.text: This suit was great for my first aqua bike. Easy on and off and kept me warm. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit although is a bit noisy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall wonderful. Ordered my exact size and it fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia B

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. The size almost perfect and material is reasonably good for the low price. I would definitely recommend this for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shorti wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shorti wetsuit! It keeps me warm, is easy to get on and off, and keeps the water out.
customer_reviews.author: SawniRes

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected and it kept me warm when I went water skiing at the end of April. I love this wetsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits very nicely. It was so nice I had my little ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits very nicely. It was so nice I had my little sister order one. It is pretty easy to get on and off as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted a long time so far. After 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Has lasted a long time so far. After 6 months of use in a pool, still going strong. I rise it after each use.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Would get it again
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit was perfect for snorkeling in 70 degree water. I ordered the size 10; I am 5'6" and 145lbs and it fit very well. Great wetsuit, especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: katheryn warren

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: O'Neill never fails to provide. Sizing is a little slim, cut for very active ladies. I'm a curvy active 5'4 , normally a size 10, but pear shaped. the O'Neill 12 is a little roomy up top, but perfect on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it perfect fit I wear in ocean paddle boarding keeps me warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great choice for me and I would highly recommend it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wet suit and I discovered that after I put oil or grease on before putting the suit on it was much easier for me to get it on. This was a great choice for me and I would highly recommend it if you have sensitive skin toward the harsh chemicals and salt water. This suit has become a buffer for me and now I don't have scratchy and irritated skin.
customer_reviews.author: Loren A. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Wet suit
customer_reviews.text: The wet suit was well made and the fit was perfect. It was just right for snorkeling while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: F. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this wetsuit although I would order your true size. I followed some reviews on sizing and it is a little bigger than I would like. Quality and price are right on!
customer_reviews.author: Celestae

customer_reviews.title: It was a beautiful wet suit except the sizing runs very small so ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful wet suit except the sizing runs very small so I had to return it for a larger size
customer_reviews.author: R. Carter

customer_reviews.title: I was worry about the size but fortunately came out exact the size I needed Very happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worry about the size but fortunately came out exact the size I needed Very happy with material and overall .
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Buy Womens, not large Youth
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1 and 114 lbs, so my dilema was to either buy a womens, or a large youth. While I fit into a youth 14, the womens was MUCH MORE comfortable(more room in the crotch, legs longer, to top of knee, rather than 1/3 down thigh like youth 14). Haven't worn it in the water yet, but expect it to be great according to other reviews. Arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: s schenone

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and now that I have my suit I am pleased. I'm glad I ordered this type for snorkeling in Florida winter waters.
customer_reviews.author: JS496

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 12 but I wished I got a slightly bigger size. I'm 1.68m and 63kg. Hope this you when choosing the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the suit was fine but I was very uncomfortable with the nect configurations
customer_reviews.text: I returned it as the colar squeezed my neck. The rest of the suit was fine but I was very uncomfortable with the nect configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Bohley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size but we like it for another family member.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Paul Deussen

product_meta.title: O'Neill Women's Reactor 2mm Short Sleeve Back Zip Spring Wetsuit
product_meta.description: O'Neill Reactor Springsuit Women's Wetsuit The 2mm O'Neill REACTOR Springsuit gets you into a quality wetsuit at a great price! 30% of the suit (shoulders, sleeves, underarms) are made of superstretch neoprene so it won't restrict your upper body range of
feature_bullets: Should fit snug, but not too tight
2mm Fluid Foam Neoprene; Smooth Skin Chest Panel
YKK Back Zip, Hidden Key Pocket
